title: Green Economy Toolkit - Questionnaire
hero.title: Join the Green Economy Movement
hero.paragraph1:
Aforika Borwa le lefatshe di fetogela kwa ikonoming e tala, mme seo
            e tlhola ditšhono tse dintsi tsa dikgwebo mo go tse di ntšhwafadiwang,
            makala a paakanyo le go dira sešwa.
hero.paragraph2:
Re batla go abelana le lona ditshono tse, ka jalo re thusa batho ba
            ke bagwebi ba godisa letlole la bone la ikonomi 10 x ka bonako. Botala
            Ikonomi Toolkit e thusa dipuso le ditheo go rulaganya
            phetogo ya ikonomi e tala. Go tswa mo ditemogong, banka ya kgwebo e tala o
            e tla bona tshedimosetso e tala, tshegetso le tlhabololo go fetoga
            dikao tsa kgwebo tse di tlwaelegileng mo ikonoming e e tala
hero.paragraph3:
Re go thusa mmogo kaelo ya kgato ka kgato ya gore o ka fitlhelela jang
            dipoelo tsa ikonomi e e tala le go dira gore kgwebo ya gago e dire ka
            lefatshe lotlhe le letala
focus.title: Dikarolo tse robongwe tsa go tsepamisa mogopolo mo ikonoming e tala mo Aforika Borwa
focus.subtitle: (Seboka se setala sa Ikonomi, 2010)
focus.energy: Eneji (e e phepa le e e nang le bokgoni)
focus.naturalResource: Tshomarelo ya metswedi ya tlhago le taolo (go akaretsa le meepo)
focus.transport: Dipalangwa tse di tswelelang le mafaratlhatlha
focus.environmental: Go tswelela pele ga tikologo, go akaretsa le thuto ya bojanala
focus.buildings: Dikago tse ditala le tikologo e e agilweng
focus.waste: Taolo ya matlakala a a tswelelang le go dirisa gape
focus.production: Tlhagiso le tiriso e e tswelelang
business.title: Go baakanyetsa kgwebo ya gago ya ikonomi e e tala
business.card1.title: Mo kgwebong ya gago
business.card1.paragraph1:
Lefatshe le tsamaela kwa ikonoming e tala, mme Aforika Borwa e tshwanetse go
              dira jalo le fa e le gore e tla tswelela go gweba ka boditšhabatšhaba. Ya rona
              dikago tse di leng teng le diporojeke tse dišwa di tshwanetse go tlhamiwa, go agiwa,
              e e dirilweng, e e tlhokometsweng, e e nang le yone le e e neng e dirisiwa ka tsela e e tswelelang pele, le
              mafaratlhatlha a mašwa a tshwanetse go agiwa go ya ka melawana e e tala, ka jalo
              ga e dirise maatla le metsi a mantsi thata, le ya naga .
              boleng jwa tiro bo tlhoka go dirwa.
business.card1.paragraph2:
Ke gone fa o tsenang teng. Mme o netefatsa jang gore o ka bona
              dingwe tsa tiro eno?
business.card2.title: Mo isagong ya gago
business.card2.paragraph1:
Puso ya Aforika Borwa e tlhophile mafelo a le robongwe a a tshwanetseng go tsepamisa mogopolo mo go
              go fetogela kwa ikonoming e tala: temothuo, maatla (e e phepa le
              bokgoni), tshomarelo le taolo ya metswedi ya tlholego
              (go akaretsa le meepo), dipalangwa tse di tswelelang le mafaratlhatlha,
              go itsetsepela ga tikologo (go akaretsa le thuto ya bojanala), botala
              dikago le tikologo e e agilweng, taolo ya matlakala a a tswelelang
              le go dirisa dilo gape, go laola metsi, le go tlhagisa dilo tse di tswelelang pele le
              tiriso.
business.card2.paragraph2: Batlisisa ka ga ditšhono tsa ikonomi e tala mo lephateng la IRM.
info.joinNetwork.title: Tsenela Neteweke ya Ikonomi e Tala e e Botala
info.joinNetwork.description:
Ditšhono tsa phitlhelelo tsa bogwebi mo teng ga ikonomi e e tala
            diketane tsa boleng, go thusa go golaganya bagwebi le ba bangwe le go
            mebaraka, mmogo le go duelela, katiso ya kgwebo
info.opportunities.title: Ditšhono
info.opportunities.description:
Batlisisa ditšhono tsa tiro tsa bošeng jaaka di nna teng
            mo teng ga sebaka sa ikonomi e tala – go tswa mo patlisisong le mo boitshimololeding go ya go
            ntshodikuno le ditirelo
info.events.title: Ditiragalo tsa Ditiragalo Khalendara
info.events.description:
Leba khalendara ya ditiragalo tse di tshelang le go dirisana le bagwebi le
            bomankge mo teng ga sebaka sa ikonomi e tala ka sethala sa rona sa ditiragalo
news.title: Dikgang tsa ikonomi tse ditala le dintšhwafatso
events.title: khalendara ya ditiragalo
events.description:
Leba khalendara ya rona ya ditiragalo tse di tshelang le go dirisana le bagwebi le
            bomankge mo teng ga sebaka sa ikonomi e tala ka sethala sa rona sa ditiragalo

fundingHub.title: Didiriswa tsa Ikonomi tse di Tala - Lefelo la Matlole
fundingHub.hero_description: Ribolola ditšhono tsa bošeng tsa matlole tse ditala tse di rulagantsweng go ya ka ditlhoko tsa gago. Polokelo ya rona e e fetogang e tlamela ka dintšhwafatso tsa nako ya mmatota ka ga dithuso tsa madi, dikadimo, le mananeo a dipeeletso go tshegetsa phetogo ya gago go ya kwa ikonoming e e tswelelang.
fundingHub.results_title: Ditšhono tsa Matlole a a leng teng
fundingHub.apply_title: Kafa o ka Dirang Matlole ka Gone
fundingHub.apply_step1_description: Dirisa ditlhotlhi tsa rona go supa mananeo a matlole a a tsamaelanang le mofuta wa porojeke ya gago, lekala, le ditlhokego tsa matlole.
fundingHub.apply_step2_description: Bala ka kelotlhoko dikelo tsa go tshwanelega le ditlhokego tsa tiriso tsa tšhono nngwe le nngwe ya matlole.
fundingHub.apply_step3_description: Kgobokanya ditokomane tse di tlhokegang mme o romele kopo ya gago pele ga letlha la bofelo.
verifyemail.title: Netefatso ya Imeile - Didirisiwa tsa Ikonomi tse di Tala
verifyemail.message: Go dira netefatso ya gago ya imeile...
about.title: Didiriswa tsa Ikonomi tse di Tala - Ka ga
about.hero_image: Mosadi wa seporofešenale mo vest ya pabalesego
about.hero_description:
Ikonomi e tala ke e e akaretsang mo setšhabeng le e e tswelelang pele mo tikologong.
                                E tokafatsa boitekanelo jwa batho le go aga tekatekano ya loago fa e ntse e fokotsa tikologo
                                dikotsi le go tlhaela ga ikholoji. Ka mafoko a a bonolo, re ka akanya ka ikonomi e e tala
                                jaaka e leng gore ke khabone e e kwa tlase, e e somarelang didirisiwa le e e akaretsang mo setšhabeng.
about.priority_title: Dikarolo tse robongwe tsa go tsepamisa mogopolo mo ikonoming e tala mo Aforika Borwa
about.focus_energy: Eneji (e e phepa le e e nang le bokgoni)
about.focus_natural_resource: Tshomarelo ya metswedi ya tlhago le taolo (go akaretsa le meepo)
about.focus_transport: Dipalangwa tse di tswelelang le mafaratlhatlha
about.focus_environmental: Go tswelela pele ga tikologo, go akaretsa le thuto ya bojanala
about.focus_buildings: Dikago tse ditala le tikologo e e agilweng
about.focus_waste: Taolo ya matlakala a a tswelelang le go dirisa gape
about.focus_production: Tlhagiso le tiriso e e tswelelang
about.climate_risks_subtitle: Phetogo ya tlelaemete e tla ama jang kgwebo ya gago?
about.response_title: Tsela e re ka tsibogelang phetogo ya tlelaemete ka yone
about.adaptation_description1: Go tlwaela go raya go nna o le mo leseding le go nna o siametse go tlwaela diphetogo tse di bakilweng ke phetogo ya tlelaemete. Ke ka go dira dithulaganyo le diphetogo go samagana le ditiragalo tse di jaaka komelelo kgotsa merwalela e e ka diragalang gantsi ka ntlha ya phetogo ya tlelaemete.
about.adaptation_description2: Sekao: balemirui mo Aforika Borwa ba fetola tsela e ba robang le go lema dijalo ka yona gore ba kgone go dirisa metsi a mannye, ka ntlha ya phokotsego ya pula. Se ke sekai sa go tlwaela tlelaemete e e fetogang.
about.mitigation_description1: Go fokotsa go leka go leka go emisa kgotsa go fokotsa ditiro tse di dirang gore phetogo ya tlelaemete e nne maswe le go feta. Seno se ka akaretsa go fokotsa mesi ya gase e e tswang mo magaleng a a tukang kgotsa mo oling, e e gololang khabonetaeokosaete e ntsi mo lefaufaung, mme seno se baka phetogo ya tlelaemete ka go oketsega ga themperetšha ka go tshwara mogote mo lefaufaung.
about.mitigation_description2: Sekao: Aforika Borwa e aga dipolante tse dintsi tsa maatla a phefo le tsa letsatsi go dira motlakase le go tlhagisa metswedi e mengwe ya maatla ntle le go dirisa magala a mantsi, e leng lookwane lwa masaledi a dilo tse di epolotsweng. Seno se thusa go fokotsa digase tse di bakang phetogo ya tlelaemete.
about.climate_finance_description1: Matlole a tlelaemete a kaya madi a a thusang dipuso le mekgatlho go tlhama diporojeke tse di ikaeletseng go lwantsha phetogo ya tlelaemete. Matlole ano a ka dirisiwa go aga le go rotloetsa maiteko a a jaaka diporojeke tse di phepa tsa maatla kgotsa go thusa baagi go ipaakanyetsa ditlamorago tsa tlelaemete.
about.climate_finance_description2: Sekao: Aforika Borwa e ka bona madi go tswa mo letloleng la lefatshe lotlhe go aga diphanele tsa letsatsi mo toropong. Seno se dira gore go nne le maatla a a phepa le go fokotsa ditlamorago tsa phetogo ya tlelaemete. Matlole a tlelaemete a thusa go duelela diporojeke tse di ntseng jalo.
about.climate_resilience_description1: Go itsetsepela ga tlelaemete go raya go nna thata le go nna o ipaakanyeditse go samagana le mathata a a bakiwang ke phetogo ya tlelaemete. Ke ka go netefatsa gore baagi le tlholego di ka "boela morago" morago ga ditlamorago tsa phetogo ya tlelaemete tse di jaaka merwalela kgotsa ditsuatsue.
about.climate_resilience_description2: Sekai mo Aforika Borwa: mo mafelong a go se nang metsi a mantsi mo go one, batho ba ka nna ba ithuta ditsela tsa go boloka metsi le go lema dijalo tse di sa kgoneng go emelana le komelelo. Seno se ba thusa go tshela le go dira sentle le fa go na le pula e nnye ka ntlha ya tlelaemete e e fetogang.
about.newsletter_title: Ikwadise mo lekwalodikgannyeng la rona go bona tshedimosetso ya bosheng
about.newsletter_note: *Ke tshedimosetso e e maleba fela, ga go na sepamo
gamified.title: Green Economy Toolkit - Green Quest
irmsector.title: Didiriswa tsa Ikonomi tse di Tala
irmsector.hero_title: Lekala la go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela
irmsector.hero_description1: Fa e sale ka 2019, Letsholo la Bosetšhaba la Kgwebo le ntse le etelela pele ditirisanommogo tse di nang le dikarolo tse dintsi le tsa makala a le mantsi tse di neng di lebile thata go godisa ditsela tsa bašwa go fitlhelela ditiro tsa go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela (IRM).
irmsector.hero_description2: Bokgoni jwa artisanal bo ka nna mosola mo go tshegetseng loeto le go fetogela kwa ikonoming e tala. Ka menyetla e fapaneng ya indasteri le ya lekala, dikgwebo tse nyane, tse nyane le tse mahareng (di-SMME) sebakeng sa IRM di ka sebedisa monyetla wa ho fallela hona ho moruo o motala. Ho na le menyetla ya ho tshehetsa dibaka tse ka tlase tse tsepamisitsweng tse hlalositsweng ke mmuso wa Aforika Borwa.
irmsector.agriculture_fit_description: Mo temothuong e e tswelelang, o ka nna le seabe se se botlhokwa ka go tlamela ka ditirelo tsa go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela tsa didirisiwa tsa temothuo tse di somarelang maatla le tse di sa senyeng tikologo jaaka diterekere tsa motlakase, dithulaganyo tsa go nosetsa tse di dirisang maatla a letsatsi le thekenoloji ya temothuo e e nepagetseng. Mo godimo ga moo, o ka ruta balemirui ka melemo ya mekgwa le didirisiwa tse di sa senyeng tikologo.
irmsector.agriculture_involved_descripti: Go nna le seabe, akanyetsa go tsenela dithuto le mananeo a katiso a a tsepamisitsweng mo go tsepamiseng didirisiwa tsa temothuo tse ditala, go baakanya le go tlhokomela. Tirisanommogo le mekgatlho ya temothuo le balemirui ba ba tlhokomelang tikologo go tlhaloganya ditlhokego tsa bona tse di rileng le go neelana ka ditharabololo tsa go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela tse di rulagantsweng. Rotloetsa ditirelo tsa gago ka ditšhanele tse di fitlhang kwa setšhabeng sa balemirui, o gatelela melemo ya bona ya tikologo.
irmsector.energy_title: Eneji (e e phepa le e e nang le bokgoni)
irmsector.energy_fit_description: O ka nna le bokgoni mo go tsenyeng, go baakanya le go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a maatla a a phepa, a a jaaka diphanele tsa letsatsi, di-turbine tsa phefo le go thuthafatsa ga maatla, go tsenya mowa le go tlhokomela mowa (HVAC). Ka go netefatsa gore ditsamaiso tseno di dira sentle, o na le seabe mo mokgeleng o o anameng wa go amogela maatla a a phepa.
irmsector.energy_involved_description: Batla setifikeiti kgotsa katiso mo go tsenyeng thekenoloji ya maatla a a phepa, go baakanya le go tlhokomela. Molekane le dikhamphani tsa go tsenya maatla a a ntšhwafadiwang go tlamela ka ditirelo tse di tswelelang tsa tlhokomelo. Nna o ntšhwafaditswe ka kgatelopele ya bošeng mo dithekenolojing tsa maatla a a phepa go neelana ka ditharabololo tsa go baakanya maemo a a kwa godimo.
irmsector.resource_conservation_title: Tshomarelo ya metswedi ya tlhago le taolo (go akaretsa le meepo)
irmsector.resource_fit_description: Seabe sa gago se ka akaretsa go buelela le go diragatsa mekgwa ya go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela mo intasetering ya meepo e e tswelelang. Tsepamisa maikutlo mo didirisweng tse di dirisiwang mo meepong e e nang le maikarabelo, jaaka dithulaganyo tsa go tsamaisa tse di somarelang maatla le didirisiwa tsa go epa tse di sa senyeng tikologo.
irmsector.resource_involved_description: Tirisanommogo le dikhamphani tsa meepo tse di ineetseng mo mekgweng e e tswelelang le go ithuta ka ditlhokego tsa tsone tse di rileng. Dula o tsebisitse ka ditataiso tsa indasteri bakeng sa tlhokomelo ya disebediswa tsa merafo tse sa senyeheng tikoloho. Akanyetsa go tsenela kgotsa go dirisana le mekgatlho e e ineetseng mo taolong ya didirisiwa tse di nang le maikarabelo.
irmsector.transport_title: Dipalangwa tse di tswelelang le mafaratlhatlha
irmsector.transport_fit_description: O ka nna le bokgoni mo go tsenyeng, go baakanya le go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a dipalangwa tse di sa senyeng tikologo, jaaka diteišene tsa go tšhaja tsa dikoloi tsa motlakase (EV), dithulaganyo tsa go abelana dibaesekele kgotsa ditsamaiso tsa dipalangwa tsa botlhe tse di tsamaisiwang ke maatla a a phepa.
irmsector.transport_involved_description: Bona katiso le ditifikeiti tsa go tsenya seteišene sa EV sa go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela. Tirisanommogo le dipusoselegae le bathati ba dipalangwa go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a dipalangwa tse di tswelelang. Neela boitseanape jwa gago go dikgwebo le bommasepala ba ba nang le kgatlhego ya go atolosa dikgetho tsa bona tsa dipalangwa tse di sa senyeng tikologo.
irmsector.sustainability_title: Go tswelela pele ga tikologo, go akaretsa le thuto ya bojanala
irmsector.sustainability_fit_description: Seabe sa gago se ka akaretsa go tsenya, go tlhokomela le go baakanya dikago tsa bojanala tse di sa senyegeng tikologo, tse di jaaka di-lodge tsa tikologo, dipolokelo tsa tlholego, le dilo tse di kgatlhang tsa bojanala tse di tswelelang. Mo godimo ga moo, o ka naya diporokeramo tsa katiso ka mekgwa ya go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela.
irmsector.sustainability_involved_descri: Go dirisana le dikgwebo tsa bojanala tse di tlhokomelang tikologo go tlamela ka ditirelo tsa go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela dikago tsa tsone. Tlhama didirisiwa tsa thuto le dikokoano tsa go tlhabana botlhale ka ga bojanala jo bo nang le maikarabelo le mekgwa ya go tsenya, go baakanya le go tlhokomela e e sa senyeng tikologo. Tirisanommogo le diNGO tsa tikologo go rotloetsa bojanala jo bo tswelelang mo kgaolong ya lona.
irmsector.green_building_title: Kago e e tala le tikologo e e agilweng
irmsector.green_building_fit_description: Tsepamisa mogopolo mo go tsenyeng, go baakanya le go tlhokomela dithulaganyo tse di somarelang maatla mo teng ga dikago tse ditala, tse di jaaka diphanele tsa letsatsi, go thuthafatsa go go somarelang maatla, go tsenya mowa le go tlhokomela mowa (HVAC), le dithekenoloji tse di botlhale tsa go aga.
irmsector.green_building_involved_descri: Batla ditifikeiti mo go tsenyeng didirisiwa tsa go aga, go baakanya le go tlhokomela. Tirisanommogo le difeme tsa kago ya kago e tala e e tlhokomelang tikologo go neelana ka ditirelo tsa paakanyo le tlhokomelo ya morago ga kago. Dula o tsebisitse ka maemo a moraorao a ho aha le dithekenoloji tse tala.
irmsector.waste_management_title: Taolo ya matlakala a a tswelelang le go dirisa gape
irmsector.waste_management_fit_descripti: Specialize mo go tsenyeng, go baakanya le go tlhokomela metšhini ya go dirisa gape le didirisiwa go tshegetsa maiteko a go fokotsa matlakala le go dirisa gape.
irmsector.waste_management_involved_desc: Tirisanommogo le mafelo a go dirisa dilo gape le dikhamphani tsa taolo ya matlakala go tlamela ka ditirelo tsa go baakanya le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tsa tsone, le go tsenya didirisiwa tse disha. Nna o ntšhwafaditswe ka ga diphetogo tsa intaseteri ya go dirisa gape le melawana epe e e amanang le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tse di sa senyegeng tikologo.
irmsector.water_management_fit_descripti: Tsepamisa mogopolo mo go tsenyeng, go baakanya le go tlhokomela dithekenoloji tse di bolokang metsi, tse di jaaka dithulaganyo tse di nang le matswela tsa go nosetsa le didirisiwa tsa go phepafatsa metsi.
irmsector.water_management_involved_desc: Batla ditifikeiti kgotsa mananeo a katiso a go tsenya didirisiwa tsa taolo ya metsi, go baakanya le go tlhokomela. Go dirisana le mafelo a go phepafatsa metsi le dikgwebo tse di amegang mo tshomarelong ya metsi go tlamela ka ditirelo tsa gago. Dula o tsebisitswe ka melawana ya boleng ba metsi le mekgwa ya tshomarelo.
irmsector.production_title: Tlhagiso le tiriso e e tswelelang
irmsector.production_fit_description: Buelela go baakanya le go tlhabolola didirisiwa tsa ileketeroniki le didirisiwa go rotloetsa tiriso e e tswelelang. Rotloetsa bareki go tlhopha go baakanya go na le go emisediwa ka sengwe.
irmsector.production_involved_descriptio: Tirisanommogo le batlhagisi le barekisi ba ba tlhokomelang tikologo go tlamela ka ditirelo tsa go baakanya le go tlhokomela dikumo tsa bone. Ruta bareki ka melemo ya go baakanya le go tlhokomela dithoto tsa bone go na le go di latlha le go reka tse disha. Tsaya karolo mo maitekong a selegae a go tswelela pele go lemosa ka ga mekgwa ya tiriso e e tswelelang.
irmsector.newsletter_title: Ikwadise mo lekwalodikgannyeng la rona go bona tshedimosetso ya bosheng
irmsector.newsletter_note: *Ke tshedimosetso e e maleba fela, ga go na sepamo
knowledgehub.title: Didiriswa tsa Ikonomi tse di Tala
knowledgehub.hero_title: GO TLHOKA GO REKISA HUB ya RONA
knowledgehub.learning_opportunities: Phitlhelelo ya ditšhono tsa go ithuta
knowledgehub.learning_description:
The National Business Initiative (NBI) has created an online application to improve the learning experience for technical and business-related topics.
                            
                            Key features of the app include offline access to content; the ability to download and complete content activities with outcomes logged on the learning management system when connected; interactive engagement; self-paced self-learning; the option to register and manage your profile; and tracking of learning progress.
                            
                            This app is part of the Installation, Repair and Maintenance (IRM) Initiative, which aims to unlock demand for jobs and create opportunities for youth to access those jobs. The Initiative is a collaboration between the NBI, the government and the private sector, offering demand-led skills training, workplace-based learning, and enterprise development with technology integration for a more dynamic learning process.
knowledgehub.business_support: Phitlhelelo ya tshegetso ya tlhabololo ya kgwebo
knowledgehub.business_description:
The IRM Initiative hub is a platform that provides access to various opportunities including procurement, access to market, capacity building, training and enterprise development support.
                            
                            To gain access to the various opportunities, click the link below, register and complete the application form, which will give you access to various opportunities under the "Opportunities" tab on the hub.
knowledgehub.market_description: Ditirelo tsa rona tsa tshegetso ya tlhabololo ya kgwebo di diretswe go go thusa go atlega mo mmarakeng wa gompieno o o gaisanang. Ka di-hub tsa rona, re thusa di-SMME tse di theilweng mo metsesetoropong mo go lemogeng ditšhono, le go di tlhomelela ka bokgoni le didirisiwa go netefatsa gore di tlwaelana le diphetogo tsa mmaraka. Gape re ba thusa go tlhama dineteweke le ditirisanommogo.
knowledgehub.newsletter_title: Ikwadise mo lekwalodikgannyeng la rona go bona tshedimosetso ya bosheng
knowledgehub.newsletter_note: *Ke tshedimosetso e e maleba fela, ga go na sepamo
legal.title: Semolao le Dipholisi - Didiriswa tsa Ikonomi tse di Tala
legal.hero_description:
Understand the legal requirements, policies, and regulations
                        governing green economy initiatives and sustainable business
                        practices.
legal.terms_description:
Read our platform terms and conditions, user rights, and service
                            limitations.
legal.privacy_description:
How we collect, use, and protect your personal data and business
                            information.
legal.compliance_description:
Environmental and business compliance requirements for green
                            economy participation.
legal.eia_title: Ditlhokego tsa Tshekatsheko ya Ditlamorago tsa Tikologo (EIA)
legal.eia_description:
Guidelines for conducting environmental assessments for business
                                projects. This comprehensive framework outlines the mandatory
                                processes for evaluating environmental impacts, stakeholder
                                consultation requirements, and mitigation measures for
                                sustainable development projects.
legal.carbon_title: Dielo tsa Mesi ya Khabone le go Bega
legal.carbon_description:
Mandatory reporting requirements for carbon emissions and
                                reduction targets. Includes guidelines for measuring, reporting,
                                and verifying greenhouse gas emissions, carbon credit trading,
                                and compliance with national climate commitments.
legal.waste_title: Molao wa Taolo ya Matlakala le go Busetsa gape
legal.waste_description:
Legal framework for waste disposal, recycling, and circular
                                economy practices. Covers waste classification, disposal
                                permits, recycling obligations, and extended producer
                                responsibility requirements for various industries.
legal.energy_title: Ditlhotlheletso le Ditlhokego le Ditlhokego tsa Maatla a a Ntšhwafadiwang
legal.energy_description:
Legal incentives and mandatory renewable energy adoption
                                policies. Details government incentives, feed-in tariffs, net
                                metering regulations, and renewable energy procurement
                                requirements for public and private sector entities.
legal.checklist_ems: Go Tsenngwa Tirisong ga Tsamaiso ya Taolo ya Tikologo (EMS)
legal.checklist_reporting: Ditlhokego tsa go Bega ka Tsweletso
legal.checklist_safety: Pabalesego ya Badiri mo Ditirong tse di Tala
legal.checklist_community: Go Tsenelela ga Baagi le Ditlamorago tsa Loago
legal.download_guide: Laisolola Kaedi ya go Ikobela go Ikobela
legal.legal_questions_description:
For questions about legal compliance, regulations, or policy
                            interpretation, contact our legal support team.
legal.updates_description:
Stay informed about changes to legal documents and regulations.
                            Subscribe to our legal updates newsletter.
opportunities.title: Ditshono tsa Ikonomi e Tala
opportunities.hero-description-1: Batlisisa ka ga ditšhono tsa go reka, phitlhelelo ya mmaraka, go aga bokgoni, katiso le tshegetso ya tlhabololo ya kgwebo mo lefelong la lona.
opportunities.hero-description-2: Tsebe eno ke lefelo la gago la go-to la tshedimosetso yotlhe e o e tlhokang, gone fela mo dintlheng tsa menwana ya gago. Dirisa setlhotlhi go tlhopha didirisiwa tse di diretsweng setlhopha sa gago se se rileng se se kgatlhang.
opportunities.no-results-title: Ga go na ditšhono tse di bonweng
opportunities.no-results-message: Leka go fetola patlo kgotsa ditlhotlhi tsa gago
opportunities.newsletter-title: Ikwadise mo lekwalodikgannyeng la rona go bona tshedimosetso ya bosheng
opportunities.newsletter-note: *Ke tshedimosetso e e maleba fela, ga go na sepamo
